comments.en:
A 6 color CMYKcm printer.

Annotation from Olivier Delsol(03.16.1999):
The 750 works in 4 color mode with the upp files written by DEPontius for the 740 and ghostscript 5.50, such as stc740.upp
See the Stylus 740 entry for a link.

Annotation from Manuel McLure (06/13/2000)
This printer prints beautifully using the gimp-print driver from http://gimp-print.sourceforge.net.
The "Stylus Photo" gimp-print driver can be inserted into ghostscript as the "stp" driver, see instructions on the above site.

Consumables/Refills: BW cartridge + single 6color cartridge
